name: places/ChIJRcmSG1JYwokRTtk4HOgjoKc
formattedAddress: 415 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 415 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: I worked with Gordon and his team to coordinate wallpaper installation in an UES bathroom renovation. The team was punctual, precise, asked great questions, and very efficient. The job was completed in one work day - which was a huge relief. Gordon was quick to respond to my inquiries and was flexible in scheduling an install day. He was easy to communicate with via text. Pricing wise, MidCiti came in at half the cost of the subcontractor my General Contractor recommended (who was not available anyways). I feel luck to have found Gordon on the web and I will be sure to recommend him to friends and family who need his services.

originalText.text: Gordon and his whole team at MidCiti were wonderful to work with and did an amazing job. They were friendly, respectful, professional and did exquisite work. They completed an office renovation quickly and efficiently keeping us informed throughout the entire project. I would highly recommend Midciti to my family, friends, and colleagues!

They completed an office renovation quickly and efficiently keeping us informed throughout the entire project. I would highly recommend Midciti to my family, friends, and colleagues!

originalText.text: We got Gordon's contact info from a neighbor who recommended him highly.  He responded to all our questions quickly and clearly, his installer showed up on time and was very professional, and, most importantly, our wallpaper looks incredible!  We wouldn't hesitate to recommend MidCiti Interiors to anyone who wants a high-quality wallpaper installation!

text.text: We got Gordon's contact info from a neighbor who recommended him highly.  He responded to all our questions quickly and clearly, his installer showed up on time and was very professional, and, most importantly, our wallpaper looks incredible!  We wouldn't hesitate to recommend MidCiti Interiors to anyone who wants a high-quality wallpaper installation!

originalText.text:
We hired MidCiti to install wallpaper on the ceiling of our kitchen. It turned out beautifully, and Gordon and his team were delightful. We've owned 4 different homes and hired countless contractors over the years, and they were by far the best! Very knowledgeable and courteous, and got the job done quickly. Aaron (who did our job) is a working visual artist, and he took pride in his craft and was so methodical.

This was a very different experience from the usual hell of having people in your home—we are seriously considering getting more wallpaper elsewhere in our apartment just so we can work with MidCiti again.

Aaron (who did our job) is a working visual artist, and he took pride in his craft and was so methodical.

This was a very different experience from the usual hell of having people in your home—we are seriously considering getting more wallpaper elsewhere in our apartment just so we can work with MidCiti again.

originalText.text:
I hired MidCiti to do a small job in my UES apartment.  One of the two papers was both expensive and tricky, so I wanted to be confident in my choice of installer.  Over the phone, Gordon took the time to go over in great detail exactly how many rolls of paper I would need so I did not over-purchase.  He was confident, knowledgable, and patient.

When installing the product, Aaron was professional and meticulous.  He did an amazing job putting up both papers.  And when problems arose, he and Gordon knew exactly how to troubleshoot.  There was a color defect in the expensive paper, causing a noticeable difference between adjacent panels.  I was extremely anxious about the issue, but MidCiti had it covered.
Aaron was able to find two new panels without such a color disparity and re-do the trouble section.  The end result is stunning!   Thank you both Gordon and Aaron for a lovely experience.
